channel.title: More pk points prob
channel.description: my players on my server [pi] are only getting 1pk point no matter how much they have worth on them or if they kill different players instead of the same one over again.. is there a way to make it give them like a range of pk points?

item.title: More pk points prob
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“scenemo, post:1, topic:393990”]my players on my server [pi] are only getting 1pk point no matter how much they have worth on them or if they kill different players instead of the same one over again… is there a way to make it give them like a range of pk points?[/quote]Just theory, but you could make a statement that said like
( you will have to make the variables or use current ones somehow)

ifwort <=10
then 1pkpoint

etc.Not entirely using something like that would work or not though as I don’t really pk much…

Read full topic
